text: Stacey Abrams should probably just hold a press conference today and pledge to make Biden her VP. (It would apparently make Hickenlooper happy, too.)
author: jeremyschulman

text: OR...do it like March Madness! A bracket of 16 candidates. Head-to-head matchups for like 5 minutes between to candidates. Audience votes on a winner to advance to the next round. Maybe it could be double elimination or something. Make it happen @TheDemocrats
author: jeremyschulman

text: Instead of using boring "random selection" to decide which Dems are debating which night, the DNC pick one candidate at random and let her or him choose a candidate to appear on stage with them, then let that candidate choose someone. That would be way more fun.
author: jeremyschulman

text: "Between 2015 and 2018, OSHA reported 41 hospitalizations resulting from Amazon delivery or fulfillment jobs, including 6 amputations and 15 fractures."
author: jeremyschulman
